name: AFGManta
comment: Copyright 2016-2019 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: AFGManta
methods.comment: Sets default values for this actor's properties

methods.name: UpdateManta
methods.comment: Updates the mantas location based on values being ticked

properties.name: mCachedSpline
properties.comment: Reference to the spline that was added in BP

properties.name: mSplinePath
properties.comment: Path spline that this actor should set to follow

properties.name: mCachedMesh
properties.comment: Reference to the skel mesh that was added in BP

properties.name: mCurrentTime
properties.comment: Current time ( value between 0.0 and mSecondsPerLoop

properties.name: mOffsetMagnitude
properties.comment: Magnitude of the offset to add

properties.name: mSecondsPerLoop
properties.comment: How many seconds a complete loop should take ( defaults to 900 ie 15 minutes )

properties.name: mIsSignificant
properties.comment: Is this volume in significance range

properties.name: mSignificanceRange
properties.comment: Range that this volume should be significant within
